alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and southeastern Sherman Counties through 945 PM MDT/1045 PM CDT/... At 922 PM MDT/1022 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brewster to 17 miles northwest of Winona to 10 miles south of Goodland. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brewster around 1030 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 29 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
